channel.title: Java...and question
channel.description: What happened to all of my newer posts....All posts under profile that I can find now are from 2007....( even the post from yesterday or the day before is gone..) what has happened..? Also....I got someones client and it says I need java ( another completely different one told me that too)...which I already have.... I get this error... Client is loading.... Exception in thread "main" java.Lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad Version Number in . class file at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1<Native Method> at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass<Unknown Source> at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass<Unknown Source> at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.URLClassLoader.defineClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.URLClassLoader.access$100<Unknown Source> at java.security.AccessController.doPrivilage<Native Method> at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source> at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass Internal <Unknown Source> Press any key to continue..._ This is when I click on Run on anyones client...when I click compile, it says I do not have java and to go to this site to get it.... Any suggestions on how to fix this? If you suggest get java ( tell me what to install),but... I [u]ALREADY[/u] have it...and plus I cannot get [u]ANY[/u] java installed unless by some miracle you can tell me how to do it under non-admin ( which would be [u][b]very very[/b][/u] helpful) Thankyou for reading...and even more if you help...sincerely from,,,,,......Some dude.......... Someone please help...? Does everyone here not know what to do? ( Sorry )..But I see that this has been read 35 times, without a single person knowing what to do..., or at least advice or replying ' i have no clue what to do..'

item.title: Java...and question
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

-I have fixed it =P , copy and paste java into client files, and then it works for running a client/compiling! =P
Someone close this topic =P

Read full topic

item.title: Java...and question
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

You are trying to use files that were compiled with a different version of Java.

Read full topic

item.title: Java...and question
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

Ah…But, I cannot do that because I do not have admin privilages. My java is fine though. Another problem I am having is the long time prblem of the ’ red x ’ that you can see when loading some peoples web clients. I do not have this problem for loading moparscape’s web client, but only for others. How do I also fix that problem? ( I think we should have an official thread for fixing this ‘red x’ problem as so many people have had it , and maybe all the other solutions for problems when it comes to java )

Read full topic

item.title: Java...and question
item.dc:creator: @sgC sgC
item.description:
@sgC wrote:

This error is caused by a faulty or corrupt version of Java. You should re-install or update Java to remove and errors and/or corrupt files.

Read full topic

item.title: Java...and question
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

What happened to all of my newer posts…All posts under profile that I can find now are from 2007…( even the post from yesterday or the day before is gone…) what has happened…?
Also…I got someones client and it says I need java ( another completely different one told me that too)…which I already have…
I get this error…
Client is loading…
Exception in thread “main” java.Lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad Version Number in . class file
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass
at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass
at java.lang.URLClassLoader.defineClass
at java.lang.URLClassLoader.access$100
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivilage
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass Internal
Press any key to continue…_
This is when I click on Run on anyones client…when I click compile, it says I do not have java and to go to this site to get it…
Any suggestions on how to fix this? If you suggest get java ( tell me what to install),but… I ALREADY have it…and plus I cannot get ANY java installed unless by some miracle you can tell me how to do it under non-admin ( which would be very very helpful) Thankyou for reading…and even more if you help…sincerely from,…Some dude…
Someone please help…? Does everyone here not know what to do? ( Sorry )…But I see that this has been read 35 times, without a single person knowing what to do…, or at least advice or replying ’ i have no clue what to do…’

Read full topic
